text: Kho eshinyasio eshikhongo shilinyoola balia bahandikanga eshitabu nemikhono chiabu, nibaboola mbu: “shino shirula khu Nyasaye” khobanyoole obukhala obututu bwokhushialo. Eshinyasio eshikhongo khubo - khulwakabahandinga khumikhono chiabu (nibakatia mbu ni ka Nyasaye) eshinyasio eshikhongo khubo - balilolakhosa akabakholanga
